org.xchain.framework.sax

Class CommandXmlReader.CommandHandlerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.sax.CommandHandler
      • org.xchain.framework.sax.CommandXmlReader.CommandHandlerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler
    Enclosing class:
    CommandXmlReader

    public class CommandXmlReader.CommandHandlerImpl
extends CommandHandler
    This is the class that sax event commands write to. Calling methods on this class passes the events on to the content handler of the containing xml reader.
